Chapter 2: Conclusions Chapter 3: References Abstract Opinions of Richard Lighthouse: I have been a Targeted Individual for many years now, and I am proud of the research that has lead to major breakthroughs for the Targeted community. Because I live in Houston, the local gangstalking and its sources were important to me. I have identified the Gangstalking Boss as David Cutler, who works at 5320 N Shepherd. Houston Police Chief, Art Acevedo is also involved. He sits on the Homeland Security Advisory Council for the DHS – basically advising the DHS about Gangstalking. The criminality of these covert operations are beyond belief for most people. Had someone told me 10 years ago, about the magnitude and scale of these illegal operations, I would not have believed it. Yet, the CIA has been funding this for at least 30 years (Akwei vs. NSA). This includes the microwave weapon attacks (Vircator) physical torture, and the gangstalking, which is psychological torture. These are legally defined as Torts, and we hope to take down these criminals in a courtroom, very soon. This short ebook focuses on the Houston area, where my research has uncovered the key participants. Introduction I am proud of the research I did, that led to major breakthroughs for the Targeted community, including, 1. Discovering the base of operations at Schriever Air Force Base in Colorado. 2. Identified the Rockefeller's and Rothschild's assets hidden on the London and Mexico City Stock Exchanges.
